definitions.definition: An early type of photograph created by exposing a silver surface which has previously been exposed to either iodine vapor or iodine and bromine vapors; such a photograph.
The process of making such photographs.
A faithful or exact representation or description.

main_definition: An early type of photograph created by exposing a silver surface which has previously been exposed to either iodine vapor or iodine and bromine vapors; such a photograph.
secondary_definitions: The process of making such photographs.
( obsolete , figurative ) A faithful or exact representation or description.
